message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this time, but we can negotiate further in the following rounds.
I'm willing to give you a significant portion, but I think 30% is a fair starting point.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I think my previous offer was more reasonable. I'm willing to budge a bit, but not that much.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
I'm not willing to give up that much more. I think 25% is a fair split, considering the initial offer was quite one-sided.
